Package com.github.moribund.objects.nonplayable.items

Classes and enums that are related to items (not the transferring of them) are located in this package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GroundItem
    An GroundItem that can be rendered onto the ground.
    Item
    The Item in the inventory or equipment.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EquippedItemType
    All equipped items in association with their SpriteFile and SpriteVertices.
    ItemType
    The item types of an item which contains its IDs and Sprites.

Package com.github.moribund.objects.nonplayable.items Description

Classes and enums that are related to items (not the transferring of them) are located in this package.
